readable.title: 3701226275_952547ba0f
readable.content: A boy is posing with a metal ladle in each hand . A boy with a yellow shirt and light brown shorts is posing with a long dipping spoon in each hand . A man in orange holds soup ladles and makes a funny face . A young man holds a hammer shaped object in the air with one hand and a similar shaped object in the other while making a funny expression . A young man in an orange shirt brandishes two ladles .
